projects.title: Zombie Dash
projects.summary: A zombie apocalypse game developed in C++

projects.title: Genome Matcher
projects.summary: A tool to store extremely large DNA sequences and efficiently search a query for partial or complete DNA matches

projects.title: Racing Dashboard
projects.summary: An arduino based customizable dashboard controller that displays vital car information on a dashboard screen

projects.title: Keimeno
projects.summary: A simple text editor I developed to learn how editors work. This is an ongoing project. My goal is to combine some of my most used features from emacs and vim to make a personal text editor for quick editing work

projects.title: Stock Lookup
projects.summary: A web app that provides basic financial data for companies as well as links to trending news articles
